modName: Mod Organizer - Updated Nexusmods Categories.dat - Skyrim
summary: categories.dat updated file for use with Mod Organizer for use with Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[b][i]categories.dat[/i] updated file for use with Mod Organizer.[/b]

[u][b]Use: [/b][/u]updates Mod Organizer's Categories to reference; [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/categories]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/categories[/url]
[u][b]Notes:[/b][/u] [b]For changes to take effect you'd most likely want to
remove->reinstall your mod lists.[/b] Parent ID's and default original
hierarchies have been zero'ed out and uses the category listing the
Skyrim Nexus Mods uses.
[b][u]Install:[/u][/b] Merge/Replace/Copy file to your ..\Mod Organizer\ Folder.

Also added updated ones for other BethSoft/MO supported games:
Fallout 3: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout3/mods/21209]http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout3/mods/21209[/url]


Credits to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1100552]Tannin42[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334]Mod Organizer[/url].
author: jiffyadvent
